>
[Quick Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=394) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Champion" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=24" />
<trait label="Fighter" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=71" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 149 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

**Archetypes** [Bastion](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=49) (Level 10), [Viking](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=81) (Level 10)

**Prerequisites**
[Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839)

</column>

---

You can bring your shield into place with hardly a thought. At the start of each of your turns, you gain an additional reaction that you can use only to Shield Block.
